fields.instructions: Check to show the site's header, leave unchecked to hide it.
fields.label: Show site header
fields.name: sp-show-header

fields.instructions: Optional: Background for the entire superpage. Does not affect section backgrounds.
fields.label: Page Background
fields.name: sp_default_bg_choice

sub_fields.instructions: Controls which ActionKit page data is submitted to.
sub_fields.label: ActionKit Page Shortname (required)
sub_fields.name: sp-section-actionkit

sub_fields.instructions: Note: Multi-column layouts collapse into a single column on smaller screens.
sub_fields.label: Form Layout
sub_fields.name: sp-actionkit-layout

sub_fields.instructions: Must match the AK EN name of the country exactly
sub_fields.label: Pre-select a Country:
sub_fields.name: sp-actionkit-country-preselect

sub_fields.instructions: HTML for additional custom input fields.
sub_fields.label: Custom Field HTML:
sub_fields.name: sp-actionkit-custom

sub_fields.instructions: Additional text below the submit button
sub_fields.label: Post-form text:
sub_fields.name: sp-actionkit-postformtext

sub_fields.instructions: Replaces the form once data is successfully submitted.
sub_fields.label: Confirmation Message:
sub_fields.name: sp-actionkit-confirmation

sub_fields.instructions: A label that appears above the posts. "Latest Updates" or "News", etc.
sub_fields.label: Section Title
sub_fields.name: sp-section-title

sub_fields.instructions: Optional — Loads newest blog posts by default. CAUTION: Can break your page!
sub_fields.label: WP_Query parameters
sub_fields.name: sp-posts-query-params

sub_fields.instructions: Add HTML below the content, replacing the default pagination.
sub_fields.label: After Content
sub_fields.name: sp-posts-content-after

sub_fields.instructions: The name of the menu you wish to include. See 'Menus' under 'Appearance' to make a menu.
sub_fields.label: Menu Name
sub_fields.name: sp-section-navslug

sub_fields.instructions: Determine how the menu will be displayed on screens <650px wide.
sub_fields.label: Mobile Display
sub_fields.name: sp-nav-mobile-display

sub_fields.instructions: Determine how the menu will be displayed on screens between 650 and 1023px wide.
sub_fields.label: Tablet Display
sub_fields.name: sp-nav-tablet-display

sub_fields.instructions: Determine how the menu will be displayed on screens >1023px.
sub_fields.label: Desktop Display
sub_fields.name: sp-nav-desktop-display

sub_fields.instructions: The name of the sidebar you wish to include. See 'Widgets' under 'Appearance' for full list of sidebars..
sub_fields.label: Sidebar Name
sub_fields.name: sp-section-sidebar-slug

sub_fields.instructions: 400px square. If larger, the image will be cropped down to that size.
sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: grid-square-img

sub_fields.instructions: Only applies at desktop browser widths.
sub_fields.label: Columns
sub_fields.name: grid-square-columns

sub_fields.instructions: The numerical ID of the ticker to include
sub_fields.label: Ticker ID
sub_fields.name: sp-ticker-id
